title: Returning a Once-In-A-Lifetime Request
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Kanata-chan, will you grant me my once-in-a-lifetime request?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Eh~, what is it? I’m listening~ I did ask you for something like that, too, didn’t I~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Dive with me... into the sea at Uchiura!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Eh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Kanata-chan, I want you to see the world under the sea too. It’s so beautiful!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Under the sea, huh...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>If we swim a lot, I think the nap afterwards will feel extra amazing, don’t you~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Let’s dive!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It’s Kanan-chan’s once-in-a-lifetime request after all~! Let’s swim a lot!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
